select.NEWEST: SELECT body, id FROM SOCIAL_COMMENTS WHERE payload_context_id=? AND tenant_domain=? ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT ?,?;
select.OLDEST: SELECT body, id FROM SOCIAL_COMMENTS WHERE payload_context_id=? AND tenant_domain=? ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT ?,?;
select.POPULAR: SELECT body, id FROM SOCIAL_COMMENTS WHERE payload_context_id=? AND tenant_domain=? ORDER BY likes DESC LIMIT ?,?;

select.NEWEST: SELECT body, id FROM SOCIAL_COMMENTS WHERE payload_context_id=? AND tenant_domain=? ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT ?,?;
select.OLDEST: SELECT body, id FROM SOCIAL_COMMENTS WHERE payload_context_id=? AND tenant_domain=? ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT ?,?;
select.POPULAR: SELECT body, id FROM SOCIAL_COMMENTS WHERE payload_context_id=? AND tenant_domain=? ORDER BY likes DESC LIMIT ?,?;

create.sp: CREATE PROCEDURE activity_pagin(IN i_payload_context_id VARCHAR(50),IN i_tenant_domain VARCHAR(100),IN i_order_val VARCHAR(50),IN i_order_sql VARCHAR(100),IN i_lim_val INT,IN i_lim_offset INT) BEGIN SELECT * FROM SOCIAL_COMMENTS WHERE payload_context_id=i_payload_context_id AND tenant_domain=i_tenant_domain ORDER BY CASE WHEN i_order_sql='desc' THEN id END DESC,CASE WHEN i_order_sql='asc' THEN id END ASC LIMIT i_lim_val OFFSET i_lim_offset; END

select.NEWEST: SELECT body, id FROM SOCIAL_COMMENTS WHERE payload_context_id=? AND tenant_domain=? ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT ?,?;
select.OLDEST: SELECT body, id FROM SOCIAL_COMMENTS WHERE payload_context_id=? AND tenant_domain=? ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT ?,?;
select.POPULAR: SELECT body, id FROM SOCIAL_COMMENTS WHERE payload_context_id=? AND tenant_domain=? ORDER BY likes DESC LIMIT ?,?;
